mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fms_msg_info (msg_id, create_tm, ac_reg, flight_id, flight_dt, flight_no, dept_airport, arrive_airport, std, down_msg_type, down_msg_content, down_msg_channel, down_receive_tm, up_msg_type, up_msg_content, up_msg_channel, up_send_tm, last_state, modify_tm ) VALUES (#{msgId}, #{createTm}, #{acReg}, #{flightId}, #{flightDt}, #{flightNo}, #{deptAirport}, #{arriveAirport}, #{std}, #{downMsgType}, #{downMsgContent}, #{downMsgChannel}, #{downReceiveTm}, #{upMsgType}, #{upMsgContent}, #{upMsgChannel}, #{upSendTm}, #{msgStep},#{modifyTm} )

INSERT INTO fms_msg_trail (trail_id, msg_id, create_tm, modify_tm, msg_type, msg_state, msg_reason, msg_channel, reply_content,msg_group) VALUES (#{trailId}, #{msgId}, #{createTm}, #{modifyTm},#{msgType}, #{msgState}, #{msgReason}, #{msgChannel}, #{replyContent}, #{msgGroup})
mapper.select: SELECT msg_id, create_tm, ac_reg, flight_id, flight_dt, flight_no, dept_airport, arrive_airport, std, down_msg_type, down_msg_content, down_msg_channel, down_receive_tm, up_msg_type, up_msg_content, up_msg_channel, up_send_tm, last_state, modify_tm FROM fms_msg_info WHERE msg_id = #{msgId}
